name: Cats are Liquid | Crystallo Edition BETA
name_original: Cats are Liquid | Crystallo Edition BETA
description:
A D Or left or right arrows To move left or right.
W , Space , up arrow To jump.
S To turn into liquid.


A fan game of a game called    Cats are Liquid    A Light in the Shadows.

Note: This is a beta so there might be bugs.
If you encounter a bug please tell me in the comments.
